text:
We may use the last three time steps from each of the three time series as input to the model
and predict the next time steps of each of the three time series as output. The ﬁrst sample in
the training dataset would be the following.
Input:
10, 15, 25
20, 25, 45
30, 35, 65
Listing 9.84: Example of input from the ﬁrst sample.
Output:
40, 45, 85
50, 55, 105
Listing 9.85: Example of output from the ﬁrst sample.
The split sequences() function below implements this behavior.
